records.name: Big Toe Pose
records.searchable_text: Big Toe Pose Padangusthasana Beginner Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Fold forward from your hips and grab your big toes with your first two fingers and thumbs. Keep a slight bend in your knees. Breathe deeply and gently straighten your legs as you pull on your toes.

records.name: Gorilla Pose
records.searchable_text: Gorilla Pose Padahastasana Beginner Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: From standing forward fold, slide your hands under your feet with palms facing up. Rest the tops of your feet on your hands. Bend your elbows and gently pull your torso closer to your legs. Keep breathing steadily.

records.name: Bird of Paradise Pose
records.searchable_text: Bird of Paradise Pose Svarga Dvijasana Advanced Standing Balancing
records.procedure: From a standing position, bind one arm under and around your lifted leg. Slowly straighten the bound leg while maintaining your balance. Keep your standing leg strong and breathe deeply.

records.name: Revolved Bird of Paradise Pose
records.searchable_text: Revolved Bird of Paradise Pose Parivritta Svarga Dvijasana Advanced Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Similar to Bird of Paradise, but add a twist. Bind your leg and slowly rotate your torso in the opposite direction while extending the bound leg. Keep your core engaged and breathe slowly.

records.name: Upward Salute
records.searchable_text: Upward Salute Urdhva Hastasana Beginner Standing
records.procedure: Stand tall in Mountain Pose. Inhale and sweep your arms up overhead. Keep your shoulders relaxed and reach through your fingertips toward the sky. Hold for several deep breaths.

records.name: Chair Pose
records.searchable_text: Chair Pose Utkatasana Beginner Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand with feet together. Bend your knees and lower your hips as if sitting in an invisible chair. Raise your arms overhead. Keep your weight in your heels and breathe deeply.

records.name: High Lunge Pose
records.searchable_text: High Lunge Pose Ashta Chandrasana Unknown Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Step one foot back into a lunge position. Keep your front knee directly over your ankle and back leg straight. Raise your arms overhead. Keep your core engaged and breathe steadily.

records.name: Low Lunge Pose
records.searchable_text: Low Lunge Pose Anjaneyasana Beginner Standing Balancing
records.procedure: From high lunge, lower your back knee to the ground. Keep your front knee over your ankle. Place your hands on your front thigh or reach them overhead. Breathe deeply.

records.name: Eagle Pose
records.searchable_text: Eagle Pose Garudasana Beginner Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand and wrap your right thigh over your left thigh. Hook your right foot behind your left calf if possible. Wrap your left arm under your right arm and bring palms together.

records.name: Standing Foot Behind the Head Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Foot Behind the Head Pose Durvasasana Advanced Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Standing Foot to Head Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Foot to Head Pose Trivikramasana A Advanced Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Standing Foot Behind the Head Forward Bend Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Foot Behind the Head Forward Bend Pose Richikasana Advanced Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Half Standing Forward Bend Pose
records.searchable_text: Half Standing Forward Bend Pose Ardha Uttanasana Beginner Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Standing Forward Bend Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Forward Bend Pose Uttanasana Beginner Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Standing Half Bound Lotus Forward Bend Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Half Bound Lotus Forward Bend Pose Ardha Baddha Padmottanasana Intermediate Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Goddess Pose
records.searchable_text: Goddess Pose Utkata Konasana Beginner Standing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Half Moon Pose
records.searchable_text: Half Moon Pose Ardha Chandrasana Beginner Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Revolved Half Moon Pose
records.searchable_text: Revolved Half Moon Pose Parivritta Ardha Chandrasana Beginner Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Extended Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose
records.searchable_text: Extended Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose Utthita Hasta Padangushthasana B Intermediate Standing Balancing
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Revolved Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose
records.searchable_text: Revolved Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose Parivritta Hasta Padangushthasana Intermediate Standing Balancing Utthita Hasta Padangushthasana Ardha Chandrasana Virabhadrasana C
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Hand to Big Toe Pose Utthita Hasta Padangushthasana A Intermediate Standing Balancing Utthita Hasta Padangushthasana B Tadasana Virabhadrasana C
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Mountain Pose
records.searchable_text: Mountain Pose Tadasana Beginner Standing Urdhva Hastasana Padangusthasana Utkatasana
records.procedure: Stand tall with feet parallel and hip-width apart. Ground through your feet, lengthen your spine, and relax your shoulders. Breathe deeply and feel your connection to the earth.

records.name: Pyramid Pose
records.searchable_text: Pyramid Pose Parshvottanasana Beginner Standing Forward Bend
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Extended Side Angle Pose
records.searchable_text: Extended Side Angle Pose Utthita Parshvakonasana Beginner Standing Lateral Bend Utthita Trikonasana Parivrtta Trikonasana Virabhadrasana A
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Standing Splits Pose
records.searchable_text: Standing Splits Pose Urdhva Prasarita Eka Padasana Intermediate Standing Balancing Ardha Uttanasana Virabhadrasana C Ardha Chandrasana
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Dancer  Pose
records.searchable_text: Dancer  Pose Dandayamana Dhanurasana Intermediate Standing Balancing Virabhadrasana C Ardha Chandrasana Virabhadrasana B
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Tree Pose
records.searchable_text: Tree Pose Vrikshasana Beginner Standing Balancing Utthita Trikonasana Utthita Hasta Padangushthasana A Ardha Chandrasana
records.procedure: Stand in Mountain Pose. Shift weight to your left foot and place your right foot on your inner left thigh or calf. Avoid placing it on the knee. Bring your palms together at heart center or overhead.

records.name: Triangle Pose
records.searchable_text: Triangle Pose Utthita Trikonasana Beginner Standing Lateral Bend Parivrtta Trikonasana Ardha Chandrasana Parsvottanasana
records.procedure: Stand with feet wide apart. Turn your right foot out ninety degrees. Reach your right hand toward the floor and place it on your shin, ankle, or a block. Extend your left arm toward the ceiling.

records.name: Revolved Triangle Pose
records.searchable_text: Revolved Triangle Pose Parivritta Trikonasana Beginner Standing Twist Parivrtta Parsvakonasana Ardha Chandrasana Uttanasana
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Warrior I Pose
records.searchable_text: Warrior I Pose Virabhadrasana A Beginner Standing Virabhadrasana B Chaturanga Dandasana Parsvottanasana
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Warrior II Pose
records.searchable_text: Warrior II Pose Virabhadrasana B Beginner Standing Utthita Parsvakonasana Ardha Chandrasana Utthita Trikonasana
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Warrior III Pose
records.searchable_text: Warrior III Pose Virabhadrasana C Beginner Standing Balancing Ardha Chandrasana Uttanasana Virabhadrasana A
records.procedure: Stand tall with your feet grounded. Engage your core and keep your breath steady as you hold this standing pose with awareness and stability.

records.name: Wide Legged Forward Bend I Pose
records.searchable_text: Wide Legged Forward Bend I Pose Prasarita Padottanasana A Beginner Standing Forward Bend Parivritta Prasarita Padottanasana Prasarita Padottanasana B Parshva Prasarita Padottanasana
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Wide Legged Forward Bend II Pose
records.searchable_text: Wide Legged Forward Bend II Pose Prasarita Padottanasana B Beginner Standing Forward Bend Prasarita Padottanasana C Parivritta Prasarita Padottanasana Parshva Prasarita Padottanasana

records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Revolved Wide Legged Forward Bend
records.searchable_text: Revolved Wide Legged Forward Bend Parivritta Prasarita Padottanasana Intermediate Standing Forward Bend Adho Mukha Shvanasana Uttanasana Parshvottanasana
records.procedure: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge forward from your hips and fold over your legs. Keep your knees slightly bent and breathe deeply as you release into the pose.

records.name: Side Wide Legged Forward Bend
records.searchable_text: Side Wide Legged Forward Bend Parshva Prasarita Padottanasana Intermediate Standing Forward Bend Adho Mukha Shvanasana Uttanasana Parivrtta Prasarita Padottanasana

records.name: Archer's Pose
records.searchable_text: Archer's Pose Akarna Dhanurasana Intermediate Seated Paschimottanasana Janu Shirshasana A
records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.name: Boat Pose
records.searchable_text: Boat Pose Navasana Beginner Seated Lolasana Chaturanga Dandasana
records.procedure: Sit with knees bent and feet on the floor. Lean back slightly and lift your feet, balancing on your sitting bones. Extend your arms forward and straighten your legs if possible.

records.name: Bound Angle Pose
records.searchable_text: Bound Angle Pose Baddha Konasana Beginner Seated
records.procedure: Sit and bring the soles of your feet together, letting your knees fall to the sides. Hold your feet or ankles and gently fold forward, breathing deeply.

records.name: Both Feet Behind the Head I Pose
records.searchable_text: Both Feet Behind the Head I Pose Dvi Pada Shirshasana A Advanced Seated
records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.name: Cow Face Pose
records.searchable_text: Cow Face Pose Gomukhasana Beginner Seated
records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.name: Easy Pose
records.searchable_text: Easy Pose Sukhasana Beginner Seated
records.procedure: Sit cross-legged with your spine tall. Rest your hands on your knees or in your lap. Close your eyes and breathe deeply, feeling grounded and centered.

records.name: Fire Log Pose
records.searchable_text: Fire Log Pose Agnistambhasana Beginner Seated
records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.searchable_text: Foot Behind the Head II Pose Eka Pada Shirshasana B Advanced Seated Forward Bend

records.procedure: Sit with legs extended in front of you and hands beside your hips. Press into your hands and lengthen your spine. Keep your legs active and breathe deeply.

records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.name: Bridge Pose
records.searchable_text: Bridge Pose Setu Bandha Sarvangasana Intermediate Supine Back Bend
records.procedure: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet hip-width apart. Press into your feet and lift your hips toward the ceiling. Keep your knees parallel and breathe deeply.

records.name: Corpse Pose
records.searchable_text: Corpse Pose Shavasana Beginner Supine
records.procedure: Lie on your back with legs extended and arms by your sides, palms facing up. Close your eyes and breathe naturally. Allow your entire body to relax completely.

records.name: Fish Pose
records.searchable_text: Fish Pose Matsyasana Intermediate Supine Back Bend
records.procedure: Lie on your back with legs straight. Place your hands under your lower back and press into your forearms to lift your chest. Let the crown of your head rest lightly on the mat.

records.name: Supine Foot to Head Pose
records.searchable_text: Supine Foot to Head Pose Supta Trivikramasana Intermediate Supine
records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.name: Extended Supine Hand to Big Toe Pose

records.procedure: Move into this pose with awareness and breath. Hold for several deep breaths, keeping your body relaxed and your mind focused. Come out of the pose slowly and mindfully.

records.searchable_text: Happy Baby Pose Ananda Balasana Beginner Supine
records.procedure: Lie on your back and hug your knees to your chest. Grab the outsides of your feet and draw your knees toward your armpits. Rock gently side to side.

records.name: Child's Pose

records.procedure: Kneel on the floor and touch your big toes together. Sit back on your heels and fold forward, extending your arms in front of you or alongside your body. Rest your forehead on the mat.

records.name: Cobra Pose
records.searchable_text: Cobra Pose Bhujangasana Intermediate Prone Back Bend
records.procedure: Lie on your belly with palms under your shoulders. Press into your hands and lift your chest, keeping your pelvis on the ground. Draw your shoulder blades down your back and breathe.
